Single test

```{r}
adapt_delta <- 0.8
data <- sim_hmm(N_patients = 30, N_patients_unknown_load = 5, N_time = 10, N_treatments = 1, N_obs_per_patient = 4, N_ill_states = 3, prior = prior_hmm, use_severe_state = FALSE)
  #sim_hmm(N_patients = 20, N_patients_unknown_load = 20, N_time = 10, N_treatments = 0, N_obs_per_patient = 4, N_ill_states = 3, prior = prior_hmm, use_severe_state = FALSE)
if(inherits(model, "stanmodel")) {
  fit <- sampling(model, data = data$observed, control = list(adapt_delta = adapt_delta), chains = 1)
} else {
  cmdstan_fit <- model$sample(data = data$observed, adapt_delta = adapt_delta)
  fit <- rstan::read_stan_csv(cmdstan_fit$output_files())
}
evaluation_summary(fit, data$true)

plot_sim_data_true_hmm(data)
plot_sim_data_observed_hmm(data)

data$true


```

```{r}
pairs(fit)
```


```{r}
for(i in 1:5) {
  data <- sim_hmm(N_patients = 10, N_patients_unknown_load = 0, N_time = 10, N_treatments = 1, N_obs_per_patient = 4, N_ill_states = 3, prior = prior_hmm)
  
  (plot_sim_data_observed_hmm(data) + ggtitle("Observed",i)) %>% print()
  (plot_sim_data_true_hmm(data) + ggtitle("true",i)) %>% print()
  cat("\n======== ",i, " ===========\n")
  print(data$true)
}
```

```{r}
adapt_delta <- 0.95
sbc_res <- sbc(model, generator = function() {sim_hmm(N_patients = 30, N_patients_unknown_load = 5, N_time = 10, N_treatments = 1, N_obs_per_patient = 4, N_ill_states = 3, prior = prior_hmm, use_severe_state = TRUE)}, N_steps = 10, control = list(adapt_delta = adapt_delta))

sbc_res$params %>% plot_sbc_params(binwidth = 5)
summarise_sbc_diagnostics(sbc_res)
sbc_res$diagnostics
```


```{r}
id <- 14
data <- list(observed = sbc_res$data[[id]], true = sbc_res$true_values[[id]])
if(inherits(model, "stanmodel")) {
  fit <- sampling(model, data = data$observed, control = list(adapt_delta = adapt_delta))
} else {
  cmdstan_fit <- model$sample(data = data$observed, adapt_delta = adapt_delta)
  fit <- rstan::read_stan_csv(cmdstan_fit$output_files())
}
evaluation_summary(fit, sbc_res$true_values[[id]])
data$true

plot_sim_data_observed(data) %>% print()

launch_shinystan_nonblocking(fit)
```
